import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{manageFilterTypes}from'../thunks/filterTypesThunk';const initialState={loading:false,filterTypes:[],error:''};const filterTypesSlice=createSlice({name:'filterTypes',initialState,reducers:{// Synchronous reducers go here if needed
},extraReducers:builder=>{builder.addCase(manageFilterTypes.pending,state=>{state.loading=true;}).addCase(manageFilterTypes.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state.loading=false;state.filterTypes=action.payload;state.error='';}).addCase(manageFilterTypes.rejected,(state,action)=>{state.loading=false;state.filterTypes=[];state.error=action.error.message;});}});export const{reducer:filterTypesReducer}=filterTypesSlice;export default filterTypesSlice.reducer;
